article_title: Cheer new Tacoma psych hospital, then get to work staffing it
article_text:
Alliance for South Sound Health wins right to build 120-bed psychiatric facility

History shows it’s difficult to recruit and retain mental-health specialists

The U.S. has a shortage of professionals in this field

article_metadata.news-keywords: alliance for south sound health, psychiatric hospital, multicare, franciscan, western state hospital, mental health
article_metadata.description: Local alliance should start planning immediately for a first-rate team of directors, psychiatrists, nurses, social workers and therapists.
